name: .CATROBAT
summary: Learn about .CATROBAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CATROBAT file with Pocket Code (Android). To do so, tap the three-dot menu, select Import Project, and then navigate to and open your CATROBAT file.
You can also rename a CATROBAT file to use the .zip extension and open it as you would any ZIP archive, to view the constituent files it contains.
